example.sent_cat: Va arribar fins al bosc buscant-la.

example.sent_eng: We took the train towards Abisko.
example.sent_cat: Vam agafar el tren que anava cap a Abisko.

example.sent_eng: The children started to run toward the lake.
example.sent_cat: La canalla arrencà a córrer vers el llac.

example.sent_eng: He supported a helpful movement towards the project.
example.sent_cat: Va donar suport a un moviment útil envers el projecte.

example.sent_eng: She lives toward the church.
example.sent_cat: Viu vers l'església.

example.sent_eng: My grandad was born towards the 1930s.
example.sent_cat: El meu avi va néixer cap als anys trenta.

example.sent_eng: I am studying hard toward the exam.
example.sent_cat: Estic estudiant de valent per a l'examen.

example.sent_eng: Below ground.
example.sent_cat: Sota terra.

example.sent_eng: There is a termite nest underneath the tree.
example.sent_cat: A sota de l'arbre hi ha un niu de tèrmits.

example.sent_eng: There are secrets buried beneath the surface.
example.sent_cat: Hi ha secrets enterrats sota la superfície.

example.sent_eng: Leave it under the chair.
example.sent_cat: Deixa-ho sota la cadira.

example.sent_eng: A house was built underneath the bridge.
example.sent_cat: Varen construir una casa davall del pont.

example.sent_eng: The squirrel climbed up the tree.
example.sent_cat: L'esquirol es va enfilar a l'arbre.

example.sent_eng: She ran up the stairs.
example.sent_cat: Va pujar l'escala corrent.

example.sent_eng: Filled with water.
example.sent_cat: Ple d'aigua.

example.sent_eng: Covered with blood.
example.sent_cat: Cobert de sang.

e.def_cat: Preposició utilitzada per a marcar els verbs en infinitiu.

example.sent_eng: The verb "to sing" can be transitive or intransitive.
example.sent_cat: El verb «cantar» pot ser transitiu o intransitiu.

example.sent_eng: She asked me what to do.
example.sent_cat: Em va preguntar què fer.
